channel.title: have 2 sham rocks up for grabs!!!!

item.title: Re: have 2 sham rocks up for grabs!!!!
item.content:encoded:
ok im sorry….now i remember whos trade post is it? mine right? yea thats reight….i dont see lear anywhere here do i?

unless your trading with me please goo away

item.title: Re: have 2 sham rocks up for grabs!!!!
item.content:encoded:
You're not going to get any good offers on sham rocks now, and especially not runes and such.

Today is the 24th. February has 28 days. After that it's March 1. Starting March 1, everyone can get sham rocks.

Now, seriously, do you expect someone to cough up a rune to get sham rocks or just wait 5 days.

And to note, sham rocks aren't rediculously valuable even when March isn't just around the corner. I traded a few for 10 smoke bombs each earlier.

Now, if you're offering a golden potion or two for runes, that's different, but they should be your primary offer, not the sham rocks.

item.title: Re: have 2 sham rocks up for grabs!!!!
item.content:encoded:
Those with runes, or interested in runes, are probably S3… and they can get the Sham Rock themselves through the 3 filler themes. Your request might be though to fulfill.

Good luck though.
